name: Batumi, Georgia
notes: A beautiful coastal city on the Black Sea.

name: Kutaisi, Georgia
notes: Explored the rich history and monasteries of the region.

name: Nur-Sultan, Kazakhstan
notes: The futuristic architecture was incredible to see.

name: Yakutsk, Russia
notes: Experienced the legendary cold of the world's coldest major city.

name: Tokyo, Japan
notes: The energy of Shibuya crossing was unforgettable!

name: Budapest, Hungary
notes: Relaxing in the thermal baths after exploring the Danube.

name: Düsseldorf, Germany
notes: Enjoyed the Altstadt and the modern media harbor.

name: Ljubljana, Slovenia
notes: The beautiful Dragon Bridge and castle offered stunning views.

name: Istanbul, Turkey
notes: A fascinating city where East meets West.

name: Antalya, Turkey
notes: Relaxed by the beautiful Mediterranean coast.

name: Lourdes, France
notes: A spiritual and historic town in the foothills of the Pyrenees.

name: Monaco, Monaco
notes: The beautiful views of the Mediterranean and the famous Formula 1 circuit.

name: Klagenfurt, Austria
notes: Enjoyed the beautiful Wörthersee lake and the Renaissance architecture.

name: Vienna, Austria
notes: Explored the imperial palaces and experienced the city's musical heritage.
